user.title: Neviweb130: Sinope Zigbee and Wi-Fi devices control
user.description:
Enter your Neviweb credentials and options: login (email), password, locations (use fields location, location 2 and location 3 if you have multiple locations, or leave all 3 empty to auto-detect), (set to _ to bloc detection), scan_interval, homekit_support, stat_interval and notifications.
(* = required), Click on button ? for help and documentation.

data.prefix: Neviweb account name, optional for first account.
data.network: Optional, First Neviweb location name or '_' or nothing for auto detection.
data.network2: Optional, Second Neviweb location name or '_' or nothing for auto detection.
data.network3: Optional, Third Neviweb location name or '_' or nothing for auto detection.
data.scan_interval: Optional, Neviweb polling interval, 300 to 600 sec.
data.stat_interval: Optional, Devices energy statistic polling interval, 300 to 1800 sec.
data.notify: Optional, get notification in case of device error.

reconfigure.title: Neviweb130: reconfigure options
reconfigure.description:
Update your Neviweb credentials and options: login (email), password, locations (use fields location, location 2 and location 3 if you have multiple locations, or leave all 3 empty to auto-detect), (set to _ to bloc detection), scan_interval, homekit_support, stat_interval and notifications.
(* = required), Click on button ? for help and documentation.

data.prefix: Neviweb account name, required for all accounts, set to default for first one.
data.network: Optional, First Neviweb location name or '_' or nothing for auto detection.
data.network2: Optional, Second Neviweb location name or '_' or nothing for auto detection.
data.network3: Optional, Third Neviweb location name or '_' or nothing for auto detection.
data.scan_interval: Optional, Neviweb polling interval, 300 to 600 sec.
data.stat_interval: Optional, Devices energy statistic polling interval, 300 to 1800 sec.
data.notify: Optional, get notification in case of device error.

abort.already_configured_for_this_user: A configuration already exist for this Neviweb user.
abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single instance of this integration is allowed.
abort.Max_three_instances_allowed: You cannot add more than three instances of this integration.

error.cannot_connect: Test connection to Neviweb failed, check user and password
error.bad_network_name: Network name can't contain accented characters
error.not_a_directory: This path {folder} is not a folder.
error.login_submit_failed: Cannot submit login form... Check your network or firewall.
error.too_many_sessions:
Too many active sessions ({count}).
Close all Neviweb sessions opened on other platforms.
If the error persists, disable this integration (or stop Home Assistant), wait a few minutes, then re-enable it (or restart Home Assistant).
error.bad_credentials: Invalid Neviweb username and/or password. Check your configuration parameters. Error code: {code}.
error.unknown_login_error: Unknown error while logging to Neviweb. Error code: {code}.
error.account_id_empty: Account ID is empty, check your username and password to log into Neviweb...
error.no_gateway_defined:
All Gateway ID are None.
Network selection failed. Check that your configuration network names match one of the networks in your Neviweb account.
Available networks were logged during network selection. Check your log.
error.heat_cool_warning: Warning: Service {code} is only for TH6500WF or TH6250WF thermostats.
error.entities_not_ready: Entities not finished loading, try again shortly.
error.does_not_support: Entity {entity} is {domain} {model} thermostat and does not support time format.
error.must_be_heat_cool: Entity {entity} must be a {domain} heat-cool thermostat.
error.fan_model_not_supported: Fan speed is not supported for model {model}.
error.fan_mode_not_supported: Fan mode {mode} is not supported for model {model}.
error.invalid_lock_value: Lock value {lock} is not supported for model {model}.
error.no_off_value: Entity {entity} does not support value off.
error.multiple_heating_level: Entity {entity} does not support multiple levels of heating with current configuration.
error.multiple_cooling_level: Entity {entity} does not support multiple levels of cooling with current configuration.
error.integer_needed: Invalid value for {param}, must be an integer.
error.float_needed: Invalid value for {param}, must be a float
error.missing_functionality: Entity {entity} does not have both a heat pump and an auxiliary heater.
error.invalid_value: Invalid value for {param}, must be one of {value}.
error.cannot_use_entity: Entity {entity} cannot be used with this service (action).
error.scan_interval_error: Invalid scan interval format. Use seconds or HH:MM:SS.
error.update_stopped:
Warning: Received message from Neviweb, device disconnected... Check your log...
Neviweb update will be halted for 20 minutes for {name}, id:{id}, Sku:{sku}.
error.update_restarted: Warning: Neviweb Device update restarted for {name}, Sku: {sku}.
error.usr_session:
Warning: Got USRSESSEXP error, Neviweb session expired.
Set your scan_interval parameter to less than 10 minutes to avoid this...
Reconnecting...
error.maintenance: Warning: Neviweb access temporary blocked for maintenance... Retry later.
error.access_limit: Warning: ACCSESSEXC, maximum Neviweb session number reached... Close other connections and try again.
error.error_code: Warning: Neviweb Device error code detected: {code} for device: {name}, ID: {id}, Sku: {sku}. {message}
error.temp_error: Warning: Neviweb Device temperature error code detected: {error} for device: {name}, ID: {id}, Sku: {sku}.
error.emergency_heat_error: Warning: Cannot activate BOOST (emergency heat) due to device configuration. Condition not met for {name}, Sku: {sku}.
error.ignore_miwi:
The Neviweb location selected for parameter {param} contains unsupported MiWi devices.
If this location contains only MiWi devices, use the sinope neviweb integration instead.
If mixed devices exist, set ignore_miwi: True in your neviweb130 configuration.
error.location_status: Session expired while fetching Neviweb status for location {param}. Set scan_interval < 10 minutes to avoid session expiration.
error.device_alert: Cannot get device alert for device {id}.
error.weather_data: Cannot get Neviweb weather and icon for code {code}.
error.neviweb_status: Cannot post Neviweb status for location {location} with data {data}.
error.no_stat: Got None for device {param} stats for device {name}.
error.gauge_disconnected: Warning: Tank monitor gauge disconnected: for device: {name} id: {id}, Sku: {sku}
error.request_count: Warning: {count} requests today. Safety limit: {limit}, Daily limit: 30000.
error.unknown_error: Unknown error for {name} (id: {id}) (SKU: {sku}) Report to maintainer. Data received: {data}.
error.daily_access: Maximum daily request reached... Increase interval polling frequency on Neviweb, (scan_interval).
error.update_message: Update to version {version} was installed successfully.
error.update_rejected:
Update to version {version} failed.
A rollback was performed and the old version was restored.
{message}.
error.rollback_skip:
Update to version {version} failed.
Rollback skipped, no local backup available.
{message}.
error.update_fail: Rollback could not be completed. Manual intervention required.

options.title: Neviweb130 Management
options.description:
Configure each option of Neviweb130 according to your needs.
Click on button ? for help and documentation.

error.non_ascii_prefix: Prefix must contain only ASCII characters.
error.duplicate_prefix: This prefix is already used by another Neviweb account.

dangerous_attribute_change.title: Risky attribute change

notifications.weather_icons_folder_missing: The directory /local/neviweb130/weather is missing. Weather icons png files won't be displayed. Read documentation for help.
notifications.weather_icons_folder_empty: The directory /local/neviweb130/weather is empty. No weather icon will be displayed. Read documentation for help.
